Pre-Game Insights: England handed debuts to three players while naming their playing XI for the first T20 international against Australia, to be played in Southampton on Wednesday (September 11, 2024).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The first T20I between England and Australia will be played in Southampton on Wednesday (September 11, 2024)
Others: Jordan Cox, Jacob Bethell and Jamie Overton have been named as debutants for England, who will be without the services of regular white-ball captain Jos Buttler.
Surrey all-rounder Overton was called up to the squad as his replacement.
England Playing XI: Phil Salt (C), Will Jacks, Jordan Cox, Liam Livingstone, Jacob Bethell, Sam Curran, Jamie Overton, Jofra Archer, Adil Rashid, Saqib Mahmood, Reece Topley.
